165712.どうやら今なら 対象となる冒険者を\n変えることもできるようだ……。\n対象とな:
Apparently, you can change your target
adventurers now... Would you like to change
your target adventurers?
<yesno 2><close>

165713.ふしぎな小箱に\n光り輝く文字が 浮かび上がった。\n<bw_break>:
A glowing letter appeared on the Mysterious
Box.
<bw_break>

165714.ふしぎな小箱に\n光り輝く文字が 浮かび上がった。\n<bw_break>:

165715.ふしぎな小箱は 何も反応しなかった。\n<br>\nもう一度 ふしぎな小箱を 使:
Mysterious Box did not respond to anything. It
will be <%dL_DAY> days before you can use
Mysterious Box again.
<end>

165716.ふしぎな小箱が 示した冒険者と\nアストルティア内で すれちがいましょう。\n<:
You will meet the adventurer indicated by the Mysterious Box in Astoltia. You will not be able to use the Mysterious Box again until
<%dL_DAY> days after you have completed the encounter and earned good luck.

165717.ふしぎな小箱が 示した冒険者と\nアストルティア内で すれちがいましょう。\n<:
You will meet the adventurers indicated by the Mysterious Box in Astoltia. After you have achieved a lucky pass, you can immediately
grab the Mysterious Box again.

165718.対象となる冒険者を 変更しようとしましたが\nすでに すれちがいを達成しているた:
You have already completed the Match-up, so
you can't change the target adventurer.
<end>

165719.もう一度 ふしぎな小箱を 使えるようになるのは\n<%nL_DAY>日後となりま:
It will be <%dL_DAY> days before you can use
the Mysterious Box again.
<end>

165720.ふしぎな小箱は いつでも使える状態のようだ。\n<end>:
Mysterious Box appears to be in a state of
readiness to be available at any time.
<end>

165721.ふしぎな小箱に 示された冒険者と\nアストルティア内で すれちがうことで\nフタ:
It seems that the lid can be opened by crossing paths in Astoltia with the adventurers indicated on the Mysterious Box...
It will be <%dL_DAY> days before you can use the Mysterious Box again after completing the cross paths and opening the lid.

165722.ふしぎな小箱に 示された冒険者と\nアストルティア内で すれちがうことで\nフタ:
It seems that the lid can be opened by crossing paths in Astoltia with the adventurers indicated on the Mysterious Box...
Once you have completed the crossing and the lid has been opened, you can use the Mysterious Box again immediately.

165725.<pc>は ふしぎな小箱を使った！\nしかし ここでは使えなかった！\nふしぎな:
<pc> used Mysterious Box! Mysterious

165726.ふしぎな小箱は 何も反応しなかった。\nどうやら ふしぎな小箱は \nここでは使:
Mysterious Box did not respond to anything.
Apparently Mysterious Box does not work here.
<end>

165727.<color_yellow>\nふしぎな小箱に ついての説明です。\n<br>\:
This is an explanation of the Mysterious Box. When the adventurers who are shown in the box are found, the lid will open
and the items inside can be obtained. If you do not see the indicated adventurer, you can change the adventurer by using the box the
next day.

165729.ふしぎな小箱の 導きにより\n小箱に 幸運が宿った！<se Joutyu_SE:
The Mysterious Box led us to a small box of
good fortune!<se Joutyu_SE 40>

<se Joutyu_SE 57>
The lid of the Mysterious Box opened and
something came out from inside!
<bw_break>

165733.ところが どうぐかばんが いっぱいで\n受け取れなかった。\n小箱の中身は 戻っ:
However, I couldn't receive it because my item bag was full. I'll use this small box again after I organize my item bag and make room for
more items.
